H0.text: Macula degeneration affects which part of the human body. Brain

H1.text: Macula degeneration affects which part of the human body. Skin

H2.text: Macula degeneration affects which part of the human body. Liver

H3.text: Macula degeneration affects which part of the human body. Eye

A4.text: Macular degeneration, also known as age-related macular degeneration (AMD or ARMD), is a medical condition which may result in blurred or no vision in the center of the visual field.

A5.text: The area of the macula constitutes only about 2.1% of the retina, and the remaining 97.9% (the peripheral field) remains unaffected by the disease.
